column4: 2019 at 2:30 PM authorities investigating illegal immigration detained several foreign nationals at a ​​coffee shop and massage parlor along Street 371 Khmeng Poutine
column7: said that in the above operation 12 Vietnamese nationals (10 women) using improper records were arrested and sent to the General Department of Immigration for implementation of legal proceedings. ------http://www.phnompenhreporter.com/article/69185
